Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether procedural fairness was violated due to non-receipt of a letter requesting additional documents
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review application regarding visa refusal
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Proof of sending the follow-up letter
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Proof that the letter was sent, shifting risk of non-receipt to applicant
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Procedural fairness requires meaningful opportunity to respond
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Non-receipt of communication requesting additional documents
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Incomplete document submission and claimed non-receipt of follow-up communication
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Applicant's claim of non-receipt versus proof of mailing
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: No breach found; risk lies with applicant after proof of sending
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Opportunity to respond to request for additional documents

Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose previous visa refusals
